city.name: Guangzhou
city.towerDescr: One of the tallest towers in the world, standing at 604 meters. Its observation decks offer stunning views of the city, and you can also enjoy attractions such as a glass floor and a Ferris wheel.
city.islandDescr: A historic district with colonial architecture, parks, and quiet streets. It’s an excellent place for walks and exploring Guangzhou’s history.
city.pagodaDescr: An ancient pagoda and city symbol. It features traditional Chinese architecture and is a historic monument.
city.roadDescr: One of Guangzhou’s most famous shopping streets, where you can find shops, restaurants, and markets.
city.pearlDescr: A river cruise offers scenic views of the city, especially beautiful in the evening when the city lights up.
city.huanshanDescr: Guangzhou’s main business and shopping street, home to office buildings, shops, and restaurants.
